DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a curtain wall that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specificly for the predefined types.
NOTE  The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no IfcCurtainWallType is assigned, providing its own IfcCurtainWallType.PredefinedType.
IFC4 CHANGE The attribute has been added at the end of the entity definition.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcCurtainWallType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcCurtainWallTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcCurtainWallTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no curtain wall type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcCurtainWallType.
